Html:
I just wanted some clarification on this:
CacheOnly = pull from cache or don't pull at all
CachePath=where to put the cache files
FromCache=Was this pulled from cache
UsingCache=turn on or off caching

So if I wanted to force a cache timeout of say 60 minutes, I could just create a timer to delete files from the cache directory with a last access of more than 60 minutes?
